pageContext.claim: “Gas prices are the lowest in the U.S. in over ten years! I would like to see them go even lower.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is walking a fine line here. As our friends at PolitiFact noted, gas prices were lower than anytime since 2005 over July fourth weekend, but in fact, when adjusted for inflation, they have been lower than they are now at several points over the last ten years.
